summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CALL/PUT image annotation system. Backend successfully generates both CALL and PUT annotated images automatically, but frontend display integration has issues.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Occasional timeout on single image analysis (60s timeout)
flaky_endpoints.symptoms: HTTPSConnectionPool read timeout during AI processing
flaky_endpoints.workaround: Retry request - usually works on second attempt

integration_issues.issue: Frontend not displaying separate CALL and PUT sections despite backend generating annotated images

design_issues.issue: CSS styles for .call-section (green) and .put-section (red) are defined but sections not appearing in chat

passed_tests: API health check - backend running correctly
Chat endpoint - basic text messaging working
Multiple images analysis - CALL/PUT generation for multiple images
Generated image files exist - both _call.png and _put.png files created on disk
Image generation endpoint - AI image creation working
Backend CALL/PUT annotation generation - confirmed via logs and file system
Frontend basic functionality - chat interface, image upload, typing indicators
Trading alerts system - visible and functional
CSS styling - call-section and put-section styles properly defined
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend integration to display CALL and PUT sections. Backend is correctly generating call_annotated_paths and put_annotated_paths in API responses, but frontend is not rendering the .call-section and .put-section divs. Check App.js message rendering logic for call_annotated_urls and put_annotated_urls processing.
